segments.text: Hello , welcome to the International Business Counter , Sir . What can we do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I need some help with these documents under L / C .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Is there a problem with them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My Manager sent me in , there's a problem with the shipping time . It's been delayed quite significantly and my manager is unwilling to accept it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You will need to return the documents . That's no problem ; we can deal with that for you now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . I need to get this done as soon as possible ; my manager is tearing his hair out !
segments.speaker: S2
